Elisa_Lindström:
{{short description|Swedish pop and country music singer (born 1991)}} {{Use dmy dates|date=April 2020}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Elisa Lindström | image = Elisa Lindström 2013.jpg | image_size = 250px | caption = Elisa Lindström (2013) | birth_name = Eva Elisa Lindström | alias = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|df=y|1991|04|24}} | origin = [[Töreboda]], Sweden | instrument = | genre = | occupation = Singer | years_active = 2006–present | label = | current_member_of = [[Elisa's]] | website = {{URL|http://www.elisalindstrom.com/}} }} '''Eva Elisa Lindström''' (born 24 April 1991){{cn|date=February 2024}} is a Swedish pop and country music singer, and the lead singer for the [[dansband]] [[Elisa's]]. ==Career== As part of the music group [[Lali (band)|Lali]], she participated in [[Lilla Melodifestivalen]] in 2005, where their song titled "Du får ta mitt hjärta" (You can take my heart) finished in sixth place overall.{{cite web |url=http://www.svd.se/kultur/de-tavlar-i-lilla-melodifestivalen_454717.svd |title=De tävlar i Lilla Melodifestivalen |language=sv |work=Svenska Dagbladet |date=7 September 2005 |accessdate=19 October 2013 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20131019205149/http://www.svd.se/kultur/de-tavlar-i-lilla-melodifestivalen_454717.svd |archive-date=19 October 2013 |url-status=live}} The song was co-written by Elisa herself and her sister Alma Lindström.{{cite web |url=http://smdb.kb.se/catalog/id/002010042 |title=Lilla melodifestivalen 2005 | Svensk mediedatabas |publisher=SMDB |accessdate=19 October 2013 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20131020001149/http://smdb.kb.se/catalog/id/002010042 |archive-date=20 October 2013 |url-status=live }} The band Elisa's was formed in 2009 by Lindström and others from the same musical education program in a school in [[Skövde]].{{cite web |url=http://arbetarbladet.se/noje/1.6103381-elisa-lindstrom-jag-stanger-av- |title=Elisa Lindström: "Jag stänger av" - Nöje |language=sv |publisher=arbetarbladet.se |accessdate=19 October 2013 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20131019193700/http://arbetarbladet.se/noje/1.6103381-elisa-lindstrom-jag-stanger-av- |archive-date=19 October 2013 |url-status=live }} In 2010, Lindström and Elisa's received national attention competing in the [[Sveriges Television|SVT]] danceband reality competition show ''[[Dansbandskampen]]'' (meaning "Battle of the Dancebands"), where her band qualified to the finals,{{cite web |url=http://sverigesradio.se/sida/artikel.aspx?programid=97&artikel=4235124 |title=Elisas vann Dansbandskampen - Nyheter P4 Skaraborg | Sveriges Radio |publisher=Sverigesradio.se |accessdate=19 October 2013 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20141129060015/http://sverigesradio.se/sida/artikel.aspx?programid=97&artikel=4235124 |archive-date=29 November 2014 |url-status=live }} eventually winning the contest in the final held on 11 December 2010.{{cite web |url=http://www.expressen.se/noje/tv/elisas-skona-vinst-i-dansbandskampen/ |title=Elisa's sköna vinst i "Dansbandskampen" | Expressen Nöje | Nöjesnyheter Musiknyheter Filmnyheter |work=Expressen |accessdate=19 October 2013 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140303041525/http://www.expressen.se/noje/tv/elisas-skona-vinst-i-dansbandskampen/ |archive-date=3 March 2014 |url-status=live }} Lindström won "Singer of the Year 2011" at the Guldklaven Awards in early 2012. In 2013, Lindström took part in the [[choir]] singing competition show ''[[Körslaget]]'' (meaning "Clash of the Choirs") broadcast on [[TV4 (Sweden)|TV4]], where she led a choir from her hometown of [[Töreboda]].{{cite web |url=http://www.skovdenyheter.se/artikel/25554/elisa-ger-sig-in-i-korslaget |title=Elisa ger sig in i Körslaget | Skövde Nyheter |language=sv |publisher=Skovdenyheter.se |accessdate=19 October 2013 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20131022205906/http://www.skovdenyheter.se/artikel/25554/elisa-ger-sig-in-i-korslaget |archive-date=22 October 2013 |url-status=dead }}{{cite web |url=http://sverigesradio.se/sida/artikel.aspx?programid=97&artikel=5575230 |title=Elisa's Elisa klar för Körslaget - Nyheter P4 Skaraborg | Sveriges Radio |publisher=Sverigesradio.se |accessdate=19 October 2013 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160204170045/http://sverigesradio.se/sida/artikel.aspx?programid=97&artikel=5575230 |archive-date=4 February 2016 |url-status=live }} Lindström made it to the 19 October 2013 final{{cite web |url=http://www.expressen.se/noje/elisa-lindstrom-jag-vill-vinna---vore-roligt/ |title=Elisa Lindström: "Jag vill vinna - vore roligt" | Nöje | Expressen Nöje | Nöjesnyheter Musiknyheter Filmnyheter |work=Expressen |date=5 October 2013 |accessdate=19 October 2013 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20131007124951/http://www.expressen.se/noje/elisa-lindstrom-jag-vill-vinna---vore-roligt/ |archive-date=7 October 2013 |url-status=live}} where they competed against the other finalist, a choir led by singer [[Anna Book]].{{cite web|url=http://www.gp.se/kulturnoje/1.2146322-book-sjuk-infor-korslaget-final |title=Book sjuk inför "Körslaget"-final - Kultur & Nöje |work=Göteborgs-Posten |accessdate=19 October 2013 |url-status=dead |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131019175351/http://www.gp.se/kulturnoje/1.2146322-book-sjuk-infor-korslaget-final |archivedate=19 October 2013 }} Lindström won the final of ''Körslaget''.{{cite web|url=http://www.aftonbladet.se/nojesbladet/tv/article17689473.ab|title=Elisa Lindström vann Körslaget|work=Expressen|accessdate=19 October 2013|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20131020135448/http://www.aftonbladet.se/nojesbladet/tv/article17689473.ab|archive-date=20 October 2013|url-status=live}} In November 2013 it was revealed that Lindström would participate in [[Melodifestivalen 2014]] in hopes of representing Sweden in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2014]] in Copenhagen, Denmark.{{cite web|url=http://sverigesradio.se/sida/artikel.aspx?programid=97&artikel=5700220|title=Elisa klar för Melodifestivalen|publisher=SverigesRadio.se|accessdate=12 November 2013|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20131112200051/http://sverigesradio.se/sida/artikel.aspx?programid=97&artikel=5700220|archive-date=12 November 2013|url-status=live}} She competed in the first heat with the song "Casanova".{{cite web|url=http://www.svt.se/melodifestivalen/yohio-forst-ut-pa-scen-har-ar-startordningen-for-melodifestivalen-2014|title=YOHIO först på scen – här är startordningen för Melodifestivalen 2014|publisher=Svt.se|accessdate=20 December 2013|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160304040644/http://www.svt.se/melodifestivalen/yohio-forst-ut-pa-scen-har-ar-startordningen-for-melodifestivalen-2014|archive-date=4 March 2016|url-status=live}} She participated in ''[[Let's Dance 2016]]'' which was broadcast on TV4, she won the final against [[Bianca Wahlgren Ingrosso]].{{cite web|url=http://www.tv4.se/lets-dance/deltagare |title=Deltagare i Let's dance |publisher=TV4 |accessdate=1 April 2016 |url-status=dead |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160401210653/http://www.tv4.se/lets-dance/deltagare |archivedate=1 April 2016 }} In 2016, she presented the danceband show ''Tack för dansen'' along with [[Thomas Deutgen]], the show was broadcast on TV4.{{cite web|url=http://www.tv4.se/tack-f%C3%B6r-dansen/artiklar/l%C3%A4r-k%C3%A4nna-programledarna-f%C3%B6r-tack-f%C3%B6r-dansen-568a6f48fca38f8bf9000822|title=Lär känna programledarna för Tack för dansen - Tack för dansen |publisher=TV4 |accessdate=30 August 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160918052542/http://www.tv4.se/tack-f%C3%B6r-dansen/artiklar/l%C3%A4r-k%C3%A4nna-programledarna-f%C3%B6r-tack-f%C3%B6r-dansen-568a6f48fca38f8bf9000822|archive-date=18 September 2016|url-status=live}} Elisa participated in [[Melodifestivalen 2021]] with her song "Den du är", which was eliminated in the semi-finals.{{Cite web|url=https://www.aftonbladet.se/a/0KBPqE|title=LISTA: De tävlar i Melodifestivalen 2021|website=Aftonbladet|accessdate=4 December 2020}} She participated in [[Melodifestivalen 2024]] with "Forever Yours";{{cite web|url=https://eurovision.tv/story/30-artists-melodifestivalen-2024|title=The 30 artists competing in Sweden's Melodifestivalen 2024|date=2023-12-01|access-date=2023-12-01|work=Eurovision.tv|publisher=[[European Broadcasting Union]] (EBU)}} she came second in the second voting round of her heat on 3 February 2024, qualifying for the run-off round of 2 March;{{Cite web |title=Melodifestivalen 2024 |url=https://mellopedia.svt.se/index.php/Melodifestivalen_2024#Deltävling_1:_Malmö |access-date=2024-02-03 |website=Mellopedia |language=sv |publisher=[[Sveriges Televisione|SVT]]}} there, she was ultimately eliminated. ==Personal life== Lindström lives in [[Lugnås]]. ==Discography== ===Solo albums=== *''[[Leva (album)|Leva]]'' (2014) – No. 13 Sweden ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Year ! scope="col"
